General.Name: Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural Reclamation and Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural Reclamation and Development Co.,Ltd. engages in the cultivation and sale of rice, wheat, and other crop raw grains in China. In addition, the company provides trade logistics; agricultural social services; agricultural materials supply guarantee; agricultural technical guidance services; and agricultural financial loans. Further, it produces and sells edible oils, such as soybean oil, rapeseed oil, sunflower oil, corn oil, peanut oil, rice Oil, olive oil, and other oil products; technical assistance services; and supply of agricultural materials. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Nanjing, China. Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural Reclamation and Development Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiangsu State Farms Enterprises Corporation.
